title: Rolls-Royce - Worldwide sales volume of automobiles 2007 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold automobiles, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2009.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: Rolls-Royce Motor Cars delivered approximately 4,100 automobiles in 2018 , representing a 22.2 percent increase from the previous year . The luxury auto brand is a wholly owned subsidiary of BMW . Record sales took place in 2018 thanks to the successful release of the Phantom VIII in July 2017 .
